comment: This isn't an accurate summation of Johnny's libel suit, and I'm not a fan of either Johnny or Amber. The matter at issue in Johnny's suit was whether the newspaper that branded him a wife beater was libel. The newspaper claimed that their statement was true, and libel places the burden of proof on Johnny as the plaintiff to prove the accusations were false. He failed to do so, so the newspaper is presumed to be truthful and the libel claim thrown out. WB is talking out the side of its mouth on who it decides to "protect" and why, but I do support pushing against social media canceling. I just wish WB would do so universally and admit both actors are shitty people, but we're keeping both because they're talented.
